item.title: 【Cinema Center】SERIES - X-Men.97.S01.1080p.DSNP.WEB-DL.DDP5.1.Atmos.H.264-Samuel
item.description:
X-Men ’97
Season 1

Alternate Artwork 1 | Alternate Artwork 2 | Alternate Artwork 3 | Alternate Artwork 4 | Alternate Artwork 5 | Alternate Artwork 6 | Alternate Artwork 7 | Alternate Artwork 8 | Alternate Artwork 9 | Header 1 | Header 2 | Header 3 | Header 4 | Poster 1 | Poster 2 | Poster 3 | Poster 4 | Thumbnail 1 | Thumbnail 2 | Thumbnail 3 | Thumbnail 4


2024 • 1 Season
Science Fiction, Animation, Super Hero, Action-Adventure

Description
"X-Men '97" revisits the iconic era of the 1990s as The X-Men, a band of mutants who use their uncanny gifts to protect a world that hates and fears them, are challenged like never before, forced to face a dangerous and unexpected new future.
Click to expand...
More Information
Long Description:
"X-Men '97" revisits the iconic era of the 1990s as The X-Men, a band of mutants who use their uncanny gifts to protect a world that hates and fears them, are challenged like never before, forced to face a dangerous and unexpected new future.



Some flashing lights sequences or patterns may affect photosensitive viewers.
Duration: 32m
Release Date: 2024
Genre: Science Fiction, Animation, Super Hero, Action-Adventure
Series Rating:
Season 1 Rating:
Available in the following formats:
Starring: Ray Chase, Jennifer Hale, Alison Sealy-Smith, Cal Dodd, Lenore Zann, George Buza
